mapper.select: SELECT PATIENT_ID FROM INPBILL.INP_BILL_DETAIL WHERE item_code = '310603001' AND billing_date_time >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND billing_date_time < TRUNC(SYSDATE) + 1

update INPBILL.INP_BILL_DETAIL
ITEM_CLASS = #{itemClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_SPEC = #{itemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
UNITS = #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERED_BY = #{orderedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERFORMED_BY = #{performedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COSTS = #{costs,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
CHARGES = #{charges,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
BILLING_DATE_TIME = #{billingDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPERATOR_NO = #{operatorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RCPT_NO = #{rcptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREE_COSTS = #{freeCosts,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FL_ITEM_COSTS = #{flItemCosts,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
JY_ITEM_COSTS = #{jyItemCosts,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

EXAM_LAB_REQNO = #{examLabReqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MXZDH = #{mxzdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ORDER_SUB_NO = #{orderSubNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SPECIAL_INFO = #{specialInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECIPETYPE = #{recipetype,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PACK_NO = #{packNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
TRANS_FLAG = #{transFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDETL_SN = #{feedetlSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMB_NO = #{combNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATION_CODE = #{nationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MCS_TRAC_CNT = #{mcsTracCnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VISIT_ID = #{visitId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
